fields.name: BY_2D_DATA
javadoc: All Facings with horizontal axis in order S-W-N-E

fields.name: data2d
javadoc: Ordering index for the HORIZONTALS field (S-W-N-E)

fields.name: data3d
javadoc: Ordering index for D-U-N-S-W-E

fields.name: normal
javadoc: Normalized Vector that points in the direction of this Facing

fields.name: oppositeIndex
javadoc: Index of the opposite Facing in the VALUES array

methods.name: byName
javadoc: Get the facing specified by the given name

methods.name: from2DDataValue
javadoc: Gets the EnumFacing corresponding to the given horizontal index (0-3). Out of bounds values are wrapped around. The order is S-W-N-E.

methods.name: from3DDataValue
javadoc: Gets the EnumFacing corresponding to the given index (0-5). Out of bounds values are wrapped around. The order is D-U-N-S-W-E.

methods.name: fromYRot
javadoc: Get the EnumFacing corresponding to the given angle in degrees (0-360). Out of bounds values are wrapped around. An angle of 0 is SOUTH, an angle of 90 would be WEST.

methods.name: get2DDataValue
javadoc: Get the index of this horizontal facing (0-3). The order is S-W-N-E

methods.name: get3DDataValue
javadoc: Get the Index of this Facing (0-5). The order is D-U-N-S-W-E

methods.name: getAxisDirection
javadoc: Get the AxisDirection of this Facing.

methods.name: getClockWise
javadoc: Rotate this Facing around the Y axis clockwise (NORTH => EAST => SOUTH => WEST => NORTH)

methods.name: getCounterClockWise
javadoc: Rotate this Facing around the Y axis counter-clockwise (NORTH => WEST => SOUTH => EAST => NORTH)

methods.name: getName
javadoc: Same as getName, but does not override the method from Enum.

methods.name: getNormal
javadoc: Get a normalized Vector that points in the direction of this Facing.

methods.name: getOpposite
javadoc: Get the opposite Facing (e.g. DOWN => UP)

methods.name: getStepX
javadoc: Gets the offset in the x direction to the block in front of this facing.

methods.name: getStepY
javadoc: Gets the offset in the y direction to the block in front of this facing.

methods.name: getStepZ
javadoc: Gets the offset in the z direction to the block in front of this facing.

methods.name: makeDirectionArray
javadoc: Creates an array of x y z equivalent facing values.

methods.name: orderedByNearest
javadoc: Gets the {@link EnumFacing} values for the provided entity's
looking direction. Dependent on yaw and pitch of entity looking.

methods.name: toYRot
javadoc: Gets the angle in degrees corresponding to this EnumFacing.
